title: Pathline
description: Alternate Cover edition of ASIN: B009EKB79ARune has always lived her life in the safety of anonymity, staying away from the public eye. Now, when her secret relationship to a national hero is discovered, she is thrown into the spotlight and caught at the center of a public outcry. In a world where ten percent of the population possesses super powers, and the strong are idolized as heroes and celebrity elite by the press, an unprecedented attack on a military power plant threatens to forever change the status quo. Rune finds herself torn between dealing with the fallout of the public scandal and the weight of greater dangers that could jeopardize the lives of everyone she holds dear. As the secrets of her past resurface, along with rekindled old prejudices, she must find a way to bridge the gap between her two lives. She must finally come to terms with who she really is and who she can truly trust.
author: Kaede Lazares
